description: Double pane window with board mounted behind it; "1963" stenciled in white on top pane of glass; two images of Malcolm X at top with green oval at top center; purple X in URC; painterly areas of color around images; large green and yellow R at bottom; stenciled "HA" and "LE" in bottom pane, with hand written "M"; black painterly form at center bottom on back of glass pane; cutout image of Malcolm X in ULQ of bottom pane on back of glass; window frame painted white
medium: Pigments and collage on board, mounted on back of double-hung window frame
title: Harlem
